channel.title: How do i change the port on a client
channel.description: okay i got the new butterscape client and i want to change the port cause the port is set to 43595 and i want to change it to 43594 how would i do that?

item.title: How do i change the port on a client
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Thats serverside. Go in the server.java of your server then search for 43594 and change it to whatever you like.
He means, when he loads his client, how does he change the IP already set to a new one.

In your CLIENT FOLDER,
open client.java.
I repeat, THIS IS CLIENT.JAVA IN YOUR CLIENT FOLDER! NOT SERVER FOLDER!

Search for:

setserver("

Youâ€™ll see your port number. Change it to what u want.
Next search for your port number already set.
(you search for 43595 if its the default atm).
If you find it, change to 43594.
If you do NOT find it, then compile and restart ur client and your done.
Hope this helps.
-Tony

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the port on a client
